TopicTitle: is there a mod to remove parachutes from kerbals?

Articles.Content:
Hello,

I play science mode in 1.4.3 (*) and my kerbals wear parachutes on top of their suit's backpack all the time. Even on a moon far from kerbin, which is totally silly and brings me out of the experience a bit.

Is there a way to remove those useless brow packs, or at least make them invisible when not in an atmosphere?

If it is at all possible, I might try to do it myself, but I will have to ask for a lot of help in the mod development section. As I know nothing about making mods.

 

* : I tore out redshell manually, and won't update now, because I just can't play without kopernicus.
i tried editing the persistent.sfs of my save file by changing isEnabled to False under EVACHUTE, but that didn't do it.
